channel.title: reOyez: U.S. Supreme Court Current Term Arguments for Spotify
channel.description: Oral arguments before the Supreme Court of the United States, originally presented by Oyez, a multimedia judicial archive at the IllinoisTech Chicago-Kent College of Law, and re-published to Spotify by Bad Idea Factory (https://biffud.com/) under the terms of the Oyez Creative Commons license, because Apple Podcasts is unusable since iOS 13 came out.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Supreme Court Arguments, but on Spotify.
channel.itunes:summary: Oral arguments before the Supreme Court of the United States, originally presented by Oyez, a multimedia judicial archive at the IllinoisTech Chicago-Kent College of Law, and re-published to Spotify by Bad Idea Factory (https://biffud.com/) under the terms of the Oyez Creative Commons license, because Apple Podcasts is unusable since iOS 13 came out.
channel.itunes:author: Bad Idea Factory
channel.media:copyright: All content on oyez.org and other sites and projects maintained by Oyez is released under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License.
